comments:
Build ID: I20070601-1539

Steps To Reproduce:
1. Open the attached example
2. Open editor for NewTemplateFile.xpt
3. No validation is performed due to an NPE (Error log)
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.openarchitectureware.type.emf.EmfMetaModel.getNamedElementRec(EmfMetaModel.java:174)

4. Put a name in the EPackage of My.ecore
5. Xpand validation works


More information:
The validation of an Xpand template should not depend on models, but on metamodels. Coexistence of a broken or inconsistent model should always be possible.
